column5: Just curious if anybody has stayed at any of the hotels in vermillion bay and if anybody could recommend one. I called the traveler motel, has anybody stayed there? We usually stayed in Dryden but we would like to get a little closer to camp so we don't have to rush in the morning.
There is also the Northside Motel...807-227-5339. For what it's worth, it seems to be the busier of the two.
We stay at the Nortside and have for 10 plus years. Nice and clean, but you better call now.
